Uses of Interface
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.client.MockMvcWebTestClient.ControllerSpec

  • Packages that use MockMvcWebTestClient.ControllerSpec 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.test.web.servlet.client
    Support for testing Spring MVC applications via WebTestClient with MockMvc for server request handling.
